review:
I totally love this movie ...from the bottom of my heart.....Full of comedy, romance and action.. a very pleasing movie and Especially Varun and Ileana are acting super awesome and Nargis is also too good
the cast + David Dhawan Sir are great........I literally know each and every dialogue and all the lyrics of every song.........I swear i have watched this movie 16 times...........love from Aayushi
                                                                              Pune ,India

I totally love this movie ...from the bottom of my heart.....Full of comedy, romance and action.. a very pleasing movie and Especially Varun and Ileana are acting super awesome and Nargis is also too good
the cast + David Dhawan Sir are great........I literally know each and every dialogue and all the lyrics of every song.........I swear i have watched this movie 16 times........
I really loved this movie. It was funny and the songs we're also amazing. I suggest you guys to watch this amazing movie.😍😊😉😄Full of action drama and love twists...

Great work done by Varun Dhawan, Ileana D'Cruz and Nargis Fakhri. Nargis is great. Ileana D'Cruz was pretty but would be more better if Alia Bhatt was there. Alia Bhatt and Varun are best couples of Bollywood.
I just love this movie.... I have watched this 20 times and can also watch it 100 times more.... Fantastic acting of the actors..... It is funny, romantic and full of comedy....
love varun and illeana i have watched each and every movie of Varun dhawan and even the new one that is KALANK but love MAIN TERA HERO .The songs are awesome and love them my favourite movie
Hello I am abhay of class 6 I am of 12 years old I am happy that so you make so funny films like judwaa 2  it ' s publishing is also good and I am so happy because you are my favorite hero by
I love this movie. I have seen the film 7 or 8 times . I am biggest fan of Varun Dhawan's     he is my favourite hero
This movie is quite fresh. One time watch. Varun Dhawan pulls it off with his quirkiness. Ileana is ok. Nargis is unwatchable. Beware it is extremely cringy tough.
Total awesome movie👌👌i liked it from my bottom of my heart.Full romantic comedy 😂😂Start this film and laugh for 2 hours
I like this movie sooo much. Varun is the best and Iliana was also so good. I can't forget the dialogues of this movie.
It's a fun movie... Though it has no connection with real life... It will make us laugh... And Varun so cute... 😍
Loved the movie it’s a must watch it has action comedy really good comedy that will make you laugh and i loved kalank
varun ... u r stunning n dashing as heaven in this film... u were soo adorable in this film .. i bet my fav movie is this movie n its never gonna change..
Typical masala movie. Watch only if you don't have anything to do in your life. It might entertain some extent. I personally don't like such movies Main tera Hero and Judwaa 2.
It is a very funny movie . I am a great fan of Varun Dhawan .☺😊😃👨. I know everything about him .
This is so nice movie that i am waiting when this movie is going to come in television and i love the action of varun dhawan........
Just love the film casting was totally suitable to the role and Varun....just love him watched 5his movie 29 times and still watch more...😘😘😘😘

First follow this is remake of south movie "kandireega"starring RAM POTHENI, HANSIKA MOTWNI & SOUN SOOD.....from me this minus point to movie and basic difference in both movies is language and glamour..... Bollywood has nothing only biopic and glamour 😒
I love this movie.very funny movie & characters of movie all time fav movie, must whatch movie. I am wait of main tera hero 2 with varun
